## roulette remove

remove registered item

### Synopsis

Remove registered item.
If you specify an unregistered item name,
nothing happens and you get an error.

```
roulette remove [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help          help for remove
  -n, --name string   Registered item name
```
